summary: This mod adds bolts which are lightning, put a battery in your crossbow and shoot lightning.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds bolts which are lightning, put a battery in your crossbow and shoot lightning.

You make 50 of them with a void salts. They are pretty strong but I am pretty sure void salts are pretty rare so it's fine. Requires no special crafting perk but does require a crossbow to shoot them out of.

My Good Mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17515][img]http://i686.photobucket.com/albums/vv226/Oraln/SteamStaffButton.png[/img][/url][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17279][img]http://i686.photobucket.com/albums/vv226/Oraln/DoubleHandAxeButton.png[/img][/url]


Taking, changing, doing whatever you want with this mod is both allowed and encouraged, I put very little effort into it to be honest.
author: Orain
